verses.verse: וְהֶחֱזִיקוּ֩ <WH2388> shall take hold שֶׁ֨בַע <WH7651> seven נָשִׁ֜ים <WH802> women בְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> of one בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> And in that day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לַחְמֵ֣נוּ <WH3899> our own bread נֹאכֵ֔ל <WH398> We will eat וְשִׂמְלָתֵ֖נוּ <WH8071> our own apparel נִלְבָּ֑שׁ <WH3847> and wear רַ֗ק <WH7535> let יִקָּרֵ֤א <WH7121> only let us be called שִׁמְךָ֙ <WH8034> by thy name עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> and אֱסֹ֖ף <WH622> to take away חֶרְפָּתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH2781> our reproach ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become צֶ֣מַח <WH6780> shall the branch יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִצְבִ֖י <WH6643> be beautiful וּלְכָב֑וֹד <WH3519> and glorious וּפְרִ֤י <WH6529> and the fruit הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the earth לְגָא֣וֹן <WH1347> [shall be] excellent וּלְתִפְאֶ֔רֶת <WH8597> and comely for לִפְלֵיטַ֖ת <WH6413> them that are escaped יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come הַנִּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7604> And it shall come to pass [that he that is] left בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> in Zion וְהַנּוֹתָר֙ <WH3498> and [he that] remaineth בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> holy יֵאָ֣מֶר <WH559> shall be called ל֑וֹ כָּל־ <WH3605> who הַכָּת֥וּב <WH3789> [even] every one that is written לַחַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> among the living בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

אִ֣ם ׀ <WH518> When רָחַ֣ץ <WH7364> shall have washed away אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> When the Lord אֵ֚ת <WH853> צֹאַ֣ת <WH6675> the filth בְּנוֹת־ <WH1323> of the daughters צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion וְאֶת־ <WH853> דְּמֵ֥י <WH1818> the blood יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem יָדִ֣יחַ <WH1740> and shall have purged מִקִּרְבָּ֑הּ <WH7130> from the midst בְּר֥וּחַ <WH7307> thereof by the spirit מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> of judgment וּבְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> and by the spirit בָּעֵֽר׃ <WH1197> of burning

וּבָרָ֣א <WH1254> will create יְהוָ֡ה <WH3069> God עַל֩ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole מְכ֨וֹן <WH4349> upon every dwelling place הַר־ <WH2022> of mount צִיּ֜וֹן <WH6726> Zion וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over מִקְרָאֶ֗הָ <WH4744> and upon her assemblies עָנָ֤ן ׀ <WH6051> a cloud יוֹמָם֙ <WH3119> by day וְעָשָׁ֔ן <WH6227> and smoke וְנֹ֛גַהּ <WH5051> and the shining אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> fire לֶהָבָ֖ה <WH3852> of a flaming לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all כָּב֖וֹד <WH3519> for upon all the glory חֻפָּֽה׃ <WH2646> [shall be] a defence

וְסֻכָּ֛ה <WH5521> And there shall be a tabernacle תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְצֵל־ <WH6738> for a shadow יוֹמָ֖ם <WH3119> in the daytime מֵחֹ֑רֶב <WH2721> from the heat וּלְמַחְסֶה֙ <WH4268> and for a place of refuge וּלְמִסְתּ֔וֹר <WH4563> and for a covert מִזֶּ֖רֶם <WH2230> from storm וּמִמָּטָֽר׃ <WH4306> and from rain פ
